      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      byte[][] encryptstate(byte[][] state)
      Encrypt a block state. if you don't want to print middle result please encryptstate(byte[][] state)
      byte[][] encryptstatenoprint(byte[][] state)
      Encrypt a block state without print middle result.
      java.lang.String encryptstringtobytes(java.lang.String plaintext, java.lang.String inputkey)
      this method will transfer your input text to byte stream and then encrypt them. if you want to encrypt your text file, you should invoke this method. with default ECB pattern, if you want get more secure method, go to invoke OFB's methods.

      expand key with specific rules, learn more from paper please this method will change w[] the result of key expansion

    • 方法详细资料

      • encryptstate

        public byte[][] encryptstate(byte[][] state)
        Encrypt a block state. if you don't want to print middle result please encryptstate(byte[][] state)
        参数:
        state - the 4x4 byte[][] state you want to encrypt.
        返回:
        encrypted state.

      • encryptstatenoprint

        public byte[][] encryptstatenoprint(byte[][] state)
        Encrypt a block state without print middle result.
        参数:
        state - the 4x4 byte[][] state you want to encrypt.
        返回:
        encrypted state.

      • encryptstringtobytes

        public java.lang.String encryptstringtobytes(java.lang.String plaintext,
                                             java.lang.String inputkey)
        this method will transfer your input text to byte stream and then encrypt them. if you want to encrypt your text file, you should invoke this method. with default ECB pattern, if you want get more secure method, go to invoke OFB's methods.
        参数:
        plaintext - your text need to be encrypted.
        inputkey - your key which used in encryption and it will be regard as hexadecimal characters.
        返回:
        return the encrypted string

      • getKeyExpansionresult

        public byte[][] getKeyExpansionresult()

      • Keyexpansion

        public void Keyexpansion(byte[] key)
        expand key with specific rules, learn more from paper please this method will change w[] the result of key expansion
        参数:
        key - the byte key which converted from your input key

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
